snippet.title: Colony Trailer
snippet.description:
From the creator of Mr. Scribbles comes a new mobile game that will challenge your mind to its limits! Think like a Hive-Mind and conquer your enemies in this fun, addicting adventure!

iOS download: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/colony-battle/id1554156558 

Play Store Download: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ScribbleFamilyStudio.Colony
